name: Gunfire hearts
description:
Gunfire Hearts is a bullet hell dating simulator where you shoot your words and dates alike. Navigate a flirty gunfight on a series of first dates!

Gunfire Hearts features:

  • 4 Dateable characters, each with their own patterns and special abilities
  • Silly dialogue
  • Lots of bullets!

The game is currently not finished! There is a 4th date coming soon, and I forgot to implement an end to the scientist's date. Sorry!
